meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving the details of someone's life.
meanings.sent1: The textbook provided a nonbiographical account of the historical event.
meanings.sent2: The documentary focused on the nonbiographical aspects of the subject's work.
meanings.sent3: It was refreshing to read a nonbiographical novel that delved into fantasy realms.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nonbiographical canvas, painting vivid dreams and imaginary worlds.
meanings.sent5: The artist's nonbiographical paintings captured abstract emotions and concepts.
